physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Tender abdomen, palpable liver, severe jaundice (yellow discoloration of sclera and skin), grade 2 hepatic encephalopathy, disorientation, confusion, GCS score of 10.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Condition deteriorated from grade 2 encephalopathy to severe grade 4 encephalopathy and hyperammonemia, prompting initiation of dialysis.
